mapper.sql: id, name, picUrl, docUrl, author, publish, status, price, inputDate, readCount, borrowCount, totalCount, spare1, spare2, spare3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from book
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into book (id, name, picUrl, docUrl, author, publish, status, price, inputDate, readCount, borrowCount, totalCount, spare1, spare2, spare3 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into book
id,
name,
picUrl,
docUrl,
author,
publish,
status,
price,
inputDate,
readCount,
borrowCount,
totalCount,
spare1,
spare2,
spare3,

mapper.update:
update book
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picUrl = #{record.picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
docUrl = #{record.docurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish = #{record.publish,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
inputDate = #{record.inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
readCount = #{record.readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
borrowCount = #{record.borrowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalCount = #{record.totalcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare3 = #{record.spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update book set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picUrl = #{record.picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docUrl = #{record.docurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish = #{record.publish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inputDate = #{record.inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, readCount = #{record.readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, borrowCount = #{record.borrowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalCount = #{record.totalcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare3 = #{record.spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update book
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picUrl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
docUrl = #{docurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish = #{publish,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
inputDate = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
readCount = #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
borrowCount = #{borrowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalCount = #{totalcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare3 = #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picUrl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docUrl = #{docurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish = #{publish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inputDate = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, readCount = #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, borrowCount = #{borrowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalCount = #{totalcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare3 = #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
